extendedInfo.description: Not only the visitors, even the residents of Colombo need some help to find most suitable bus routes because there are many buses on the road moving towards various destinations.This app will provide the recommended buses based on the knowledge of the local frequent travellers, linking your departure point and the intended destination, and also the points where you should get down to catch the next bus until you reach the destination, using of one, two, or three different buses, lowering your travel distance, and the time and money spent.
